content: 149 sts work textured pattern once you have 197 sts work stockinette pattern once you have 245 sts edging section 1 row 1 rs k2 m1pr * k1 p1 work from * to m m1r slip m m m1l * p1 k1 work from * to last 2 sts m1pl k2 row 2 ws k2 * k1 p1 work from * to 1 st before m m slip m * p1 k1 work from * to last 2 sts k2 row 3 rs k2 m1r * p1 k1 work from * to m m1pr slip m m m1pl * k1 p1 work from * to last 2 sts m1l k2 row 4 ws k2 * p1 k1 work from * 1 st before m m slip m * k1 p1 work from * to last 2 sts k2 repeat row 1 4 one more time 4 you have 261 sts section 2 row 1 rs k2 m1r knit to m m1r slip m m m1l knit to last 2 sts m1l k2 row 2 ws knit to 1 st before m m knit to end repeat last 2 row 13 more times you have 317 sts next row rs elastic bind off with needles us 6 / 4mm needles tutorial http //www youtube com/watch v=5mgit936vvg weave in ends block the shawl © maanel pattern for personal use only 5
